title: Won a ranked game and it doesn't show in match history. Did i get my LP ??
body: I played and won an Ezreal game and it didnt show in my match history. Figured just a bug or something but i'm not sure I got LP for it, A day later and it's still not there ?!?! It shows up on OP.GG and other sites like lolking but not in LOL client. Is there anyway to check or to be sure ? Main deal is the LP. Any answer / help is appreciated :D

replies.body: If you mean the one you went 19/1 in, then yep!  It counts!  We've been having some slowness with match history in the past day or so, but it looks like everything caught up. I'm able to see it when viewing your account in client.
